content: विभंगः {@--1@} Breaking, fracture. {@--2@} Stopping, obstruction, stoppage; <ls>Bg. 2. 26.</ls> {@--3@} Bending, contraction (as of the eyebrows); भ्रूविभंगकुटिलं च वीक्षितं <ls>R. 19. 17.</ls> {@--4@} A fold, wrinkle. {@--5@} A step, stair; <ls>R. 6. 3.</ls> {@--6@} Breaking out, manifestation; विविधविकारविभंगं <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--7@} Division.
